architecture.description: The architectures supported by the function.

authorization_type.description: The authorization type for the function URL.

cors.description: The CORS configuration for the function.
cors.type: list(object({ allow_credentials: bool, allow_headers: list(string), allow_methods: list(string), allow_origins: list(string), max_age: number }))

create_function_url.description: Whether to create a URL for the Lambda Function.

description.description: Description of what your Lambda Function does.

environment_variables.description: A map that defines environment variables for the Lambda Function.

event_source_arn.description: The ARN of the event source.

filename.description: The path to the function's deployment package(zip) within the local filesystem

function_name.description: Unique name for your Lambda Function.

handler.description: The entry point for the Lambda Function.

log_format.description: The format of the logs in the log group.

log_group_name.description: The name of the CloudWatch log group to send logs to.

role.description: The ARN of the IAM role that the Lambda Function assumes when it executes your function to access any other AWS services.

runtime.description: runtime to use when running the Lambda Function.

timeout.description: The amount of time your Lambda Function has to run in seconds.

memory_size.description: The amount of memory that your Lambda Function has access to in MB.

s3_bucket.description: The S3 bucket location that contains the function's deployment package.

s3_key.description: The S3 key of an object containing the function's deployment package.

s3_object_version.description: The object version of the function's deployment package.

system_log_level.description: The log level for the Lambda Function.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
